content: additional row for a slouchier look close the hat with a few single_crochet stitches to gather the top as shown below fasten_off and weave in ends closing the top of the hat the top of the hat is closed with a few slip stitches lay hat flat with your hook in the center front match the next stitch at center front of hat with the stitch on the opposite side at the center back of the hat slip_stitch through both stitches at the same time the lively hat crochet pattern © 2024 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful flatten the hat the opposite way to bring the two sides together slip_stitch through both center side stitches at the same time you will put your hook through the stitch closest to you then put your hook under the center top of the hat you created in the last step then put your hook through the stitch on the opposite side of the hat and slip_stitch the top of the hat will now look like a 4-leaf clover flatten the hat and slip_stitch through the center stitches of two of the clover leaves at the same time flatten the hat the other way and slip_stitch through the last two clover leaves to close the hat completely using a yarn needle thread the yarn through any stitches that look like they need tightening at the top of the hat bring yarn to inside of the hat and knot to fasten share your hat with #thelivelyhat on instagram tag me @prettypeacefulcrochet because i love to see your projects please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern and give design credit as the lively hat crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or youtube thank you for your support the lively hat crochet pattern © 2024 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful
